Activities & Events

Join our vibrant community events and activities. From language classes to cultural celebrations, there's something for everyone.

Upcoming Events

Nepali Pathshala

Weekly language classes for children and adults

Every Saturday, 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM

Community Center, Main Hall

Contact us for more information

Cultural Dance Classes

Traditional Nepali dance classes for all ages

Every Sunday, 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

Community Center, Activity Room

Contact us for more information

Past Events

Dashain Festival 2024

Annual celebration of the Dashain festival with cultural performances

October 12, 2024

Southside Community Hall

Tihar Cultural Evening

Music, dance, and food celebrating the festival of lights

November 3, 2024

Glasgow City Hall

New Year Celebration

Nepali New Year celebration with community performances

April 14, 2024

Southside Park
